metadata.name: Cscript/Wscript Uncommon Script Extension Execution
metadata.comment: Detects Wscript/Cscript executing a file with an uncommon (i.e. non-script) extension

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('wscript\.exe', 'cscript\.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cscript.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.csv')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.doc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.gif')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpeg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.png')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ppt')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.txt')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.xls')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.xml'))))

output.summary: Detects Wscript/Cscript executing a file with an uncommon (i.e. non-script) extension

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
